showerReviews.reviewText: I'm not exactly sure but I think once a month or once a quarter it can and should be cleaned. It looks ominous...!
Stayed here 6/16/25. People inside were nice, store was clean. However, truck parking lot had trash everywhere overflowing garbage cans. Also, most of the spots are paid too. ‚Ä¶

07/14/25.. 11:55pm !! Please when you hire people to clean the Showers make sure they want to do their Job it's 1:am still waiting for a shower talk to guy responsible he told me to wait another 20min

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Store is full useful stuff and daily needs items. Restrooms, shower and laundry area is very clean and maintained. ‚Ä¶

Costumer service is something they really need to learn and mostly they need to do their job nth I see is clean everyone is all over shower never ready

Worst service ever at this Love‚Äôs. I booked a shower, and eight were empty, but the staff responsible for cleaning was just sitting around doing nothing. Even worse, the manager was right there and didn‚Äôt say a word. Absolutely unacceptable ‚Ä¶

Folks, I am a Love's Junkie!
Intervention may be necessary!
My coffee cup refuses to pass Love's without refills!

Dropped in on the new facility in Gary, Indiana. The shower was great. Coffee fresh and my truck service was quick.
Parking can get a little tight. Store is newer and the shower was clean, well stocked and had nice hot water. Staff were all friendly.

As a disabled person that travels with a otr driver I wanted to say that Hank you for having shower benches.  I wish more places provided these even most of the new lives don't. As a women we do need an additional towel for our hair and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ right information. Came in this morning and was being treated for rude by a supervisor April I will only be here to take a shower and fuel don‚Äôt ever stay the night honestly I see why they need a security guard to protect the employees lol.

showerReviews.reviewText: Parking lot is a tad sketchy but the store is super nice and clean. No wait at all for a shower and ordered a pizza. Tons of parking though. Maybe get a reserved spot as they are up front.

‚Ä¶ a reset. It was quiet (for a truck stop). I didn't see anyone loitering or hitting drivers up for cash. I took a good long hot shower in a clean shower room. I really have no complaints. I arrived at 21:30 and there was still surprising a ‚Ä¶

This place is suck , full of lazy 17 showers but nobody want to clean , I got 3 people ahead of me , I wait 1 1/2 to get showers when I ask at counter , the lazy lady show me attitude, the guy who clean shower,  he walk around here and ‚Ä¶

Some of the best people and some of the most helpful people. I did not have a shower on my card and they went out of their way to help me get one.. This is the only place I stop when I come to the Chicago area. ‚Ä¶

My shower was lukewarm at best. I had Goosebumps through the entire shower. Then at 8pm When I was trying to get some sleep I heard a knock on my door. It was the parking police. He said I either needed to move go pay for parking or he was ‚Ä¶
$25 for a shower? Those are California prices just go to Illinois $17. Truck stops rip Drivers off. Prices are stupid! Shop Ma and PA stops!

I haven't fueled up here in a while so I didn't have any shower credits. I'm a truck driver. I went in to just pay for a shower and was shocked that it cost $25. The company I drive for is a mega carrier, which means we buy tens of ‚Ä¶
Unprofessional people, 25 people working, no one cleans shower, manager 70  years old lady, doesn‚Äôt know what to do.
Good service, good service, great shower, tidy. everything clean. I recommend.

You guys charge $25 for a shower and we can not even get soap or a toilet seat?!?!
I think that's a little messed up

showerReviews.reviewText: Thank goodness for the shower staff, that's why I gave 1 star...for them guys. 6/16/25 Afternoon.  Horrible attitudes and service.  Pass it up if possible. üíØ ‚Ä¶
showerReviews.uniqueId: Ang Walker and Travelling Jack_Thank_goodness_for_the_shower_staff,_that's_why_I__3 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: 07/14/25.. 11:55pm !! Please when you hire people to clean the Showers make sure they want to do their Job it's 1:am still waiting for a shower talk to guy responsible he told me to wait another 20min

‚Ä¶ place is ok. Not that big inside I like the fact that it has a Subway inside got to be careful in the shower and get my towels but the service is really good can't complain with that I'm parking I like it's nice structured has there truck ‚Ä¶
Clerks greeted/asked if I needed help (I didn't). Shower was clean, water was hot. All I care about. 5 Stars

‚Ä¶ with light sweep god the burnt hot dogs just killed it pilot really dropping the ball.had to wait 45 minutes for shower  went to eat gyros accross the street pilot was appealing enough to eat their.dont hate me im in more pilots and ‚Ä¶
Karolis RadiunLocal Guide ¬∑ 46 reviews ¬∑ 7 photosÓóîÓ†∏Ó†∏Ó†∏Ó†∏Ó†∏2 months ago Shower #4Ó£úLikeÓ†ç Share
Shower while one of the most expensive I've ever used was very clean. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ was clean for the age of the stop. The inside of the store is dated, a little run down and needs some TLC. I took a shower and the water was not warm. No hot water just what comes out of the tap. The shower head in 5 was broken and spewed ‚Ä¶
Long wait for shower all dirty shower and no one cleaning them have about 7 dirty shower

Average pilot truck stop. Shower was not as clean as you'd like it to be.  The best thing about this one was the night counter person. She was great. Super friendly and helpful and a great attitude even though she was in there by herself at ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ patrols the lot at night. Although fully stocked, there seems to be a shortage in assistance in the store. The shower attendants were very friendly. The showers and laundry room were very clean. This travel center offers Verizon service, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stops my company use for reasons that will never make sense to me. We asked for a bigger shower because the showers are small and crammed for two people. Other truck stops never have an issue with accommodating us but the guy that ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Its not the Sheraton hotel don't count on vala parking or porter to grab your bags when your going to take a shower.. It's a truck stop...
I wanted to take a shower, waited 30 minutes but there was no hot water, it was better to go to the Pilot, I was not happy with the shower

Very bad service ever given my TA by stupid guy. Someone who can not give shower just looking like he doesn't care about the service is providing everybody was disappointed with this crazy guy, he was just on phone and refusing to give me ‚Ä¶

Nice place but no water pressure in showers. You would be better off using the hose in the fuel island. Water was about as warm. Not worth $15.00 or wasting one of your shower credits. Disappointing to say the least.

Told I had to have a mask on but the security officer leaning on the counter wasn't wearing one, pfft corporate America.  All day on the road and wanted to eat and shower.  Nope cause I didn't have a mask.  Oh and to make it even more ‚Ä¶
There was a huge parking lot. I stopped there to take a shower and went inside shower number 11. However, the shower head was broken. I have attached a picture of how it looked.

‚Ä¶ didn‚Äôt even close the pump line. I had change the pump three times. Next I visited for quick fuel up and shower. Showers are good and clean but the staff knock the door every 10-minutes I have no idea why. I yelled them couple times ‚Äúit‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

The shower appeared as if it had been swept in weeks, the water pressure sucks. I felt like needed to go across the street and take a 2nd shower. Thought I would try the restaurant..bad idea #2 $11:00 for soup and salad and a tea...butt is ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Me and my teammate was just coming to get a shower but of course the two old white ladies couldn‚Äôt stand to see us black people get a shower we made a parking spot just like the rest I felt her watching me as I walked back just as I was ‚Ä¶
I stop here to take a shower and snack and drink  and clean  bathroom   and clean shower and free wifi
I'm a trucker driver and was stickered and towed while in shower for doing my restart here security really ruin business with this place
Small - called MR FUEL but bought out by Pilot/Flying J . Shower & store was clean on my visit .
Shower only $5

locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Store is full useful stuff and daily needs items. Restrooms, shower and laundry area is very clean and maintained. ‚Ä¶
Shower 1 has zero water pressure unless you turn the knob all the way to the hottest setting. When you do that it's way too hot almost boiling. And this is coming from someone who loves hot showers
Costumer service is something they really need to learn and mostly they need to do their job nth I see is clean everyone is all over shower never ready

Worst service ever at this Love‚Äôs. I booked a shower, and eight were empty, but the staff responsible for cleaning was just sitting around doing nothing. Even worse, the manager was right there and didn‚Äôt say a word. Absolutely unacceptable ‚Ä¶

Folks, I am a Love's Junkie!
Intervention may be necessary!
My coffee cup refuses to pass Love's without refills!

Dropped in on the new facility in Gary, Indiana. The shower was great. Coffee fresh and my truck service was quick.
Parking can get a little tight. Store is newer and the shower was clean, well stocked and had nice hot water. Staff were all friendly.

As a disabled person that travels with a otr driver I wanted to say that Hank you for having shower benches.  I wish more places provided these even most of the new lives don't. As a women we do need an additional towel for our hair and ‚Ä¶
Shower#4, this morning.  Can I  get a refund on my shower credit balance?
The shower water takes 2 hours to wash off, I don‚Äôt know what they add, it‚Äôs very bad, on the contrary, it doesn‚Äôt save water.

‚Ä¶ right information. Came in this morning and was being treated for rude by a supervisor April I will only be here to take a shower and fuel don‚Äôt ever stay the night honestly I see why they need a security guard to protect the employees lol.
